products.title: Amor Crimson Rose Roller Blind
products.description: The bright red amor crimson rose is sure to get people talking. Use this bold colour to create a bold statement or as a feature in a room. He amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, bathrooms and kitchens. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light. If you like these colours check them out as vertical blinds too. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: The amor pearl roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, kitchens and living rooms. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Amor Midnight Roller Blind
products.description: The amor midnight is a beautiful, matt black colour. A fabric that works well in modern interiors as a contrast to whites and pale tones. As a black blackout blind, there really is no chance of light getting through. It's suitability for moist environments makes this a perfect blind for kitchens and bathroom to go with black and white tiling. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Snowfall Roller Blind
products.description: The amor snowfall is the whitest fabric in the amor range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Brownie Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, deep brown colour of the amor brownie is great for any room in the home. The bold, solid colour is sure to stand out no matter what the decor - and the water resistant and blackout properties makes it suitable for home and office. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Amor Soft Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The light grey amor soft grey is a blind that suits a more natural looking room. Shades of stone and creams work well with this fabric but also as a contrast to darker tones of blue, brown and purple. This fabric is inoffensive and would suit any number of rooms. The amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, bathrooms and kitchens. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Amor Winterbloom Roller Blind
products.description: The very pale yellow colour of amor winterbloom is very subtle and pairs well with light interiors. While a noticeable shade of yellow this blind doesn't infringe on the surrounding decor. This blind would add a touch of warmth to white rooms. The amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms and living rooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Shark Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The deeper grey colour of the amor shark grey is one that will certainly make a statement in any room. Whether going in a bedroom, living room or bathroom this blind will fit in anywhere. This blind works especially well in modern interiors in place of black. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Rock - Roller Blind
products.description: Ajanta rock is a blackout blind that proves once and for all that style and substance can work together in perfect harmony. The neutral grey combines with an electric pattern that catches the light in a thousand different ways depending on which way you look at it. Now that you've found your dream blinds you can get busy reimagining the rest of your interiors. The floors and walls are natural places to start as they frame your window spaces and help connect them to the rest of your room.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: Include the sophisticated roma (fr) in almond within your home or commercial surrounding as an elegant addition with beneficial, practical elements. The modern rolling mechanism with its simple pull-cord creates a contemporary look, and the blind is formed with flame-retardant fabric to suit any surrounding. Forge a soothing and serene space by hanging the almond with a blend of neutral and wholesome tones, such as biscuit, ivory, and mocha.

products.title: Marble Fresco - Roller Blind
products.description: Flint is a colour that's very much in right now, so why not go in search of an original way to introduce it? Marble fresco is their unique take on the problem, and it combines an earthy colour with a subtly shimmering pattern that shines through into the foreground. The interesting thing about fresco is that it enables you to add a calming influence to your room, but still leaves you with plenty of scope to introduce lighter colours.

products.title: Deanna Cool Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The cool grey deanna is best described as a natural stone grey that yields an appealing and calming finish. The colour is beautifully complemented by the distinctive free-flowing nature of the deanna patterning. Cool grey works well in a wide range of colour schemes. Place in a monochrome bathroom amongst white enamel and light-toned tiling, or with deep reds or burnt oranges for a modern living or dining room.

products.title: Affinity Plaster - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity blind in plaster offers a fresh take on cream, infused with just a hint of buttery yellow to give this blind a richer tone without being overpowering or overtly gold. The affinity patterning adds that touch of chic class that you have been looking for. The subtle glowing quality of the affinity plaster make this blind an ideal addition to a decadent yet tasteful bedroom or living room, where it couples well with traditional wooden features.

products.title: Clarity Urban - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in the sight that is clarity urban you instantly come up with ideas for your new home interiors projects. It's a lightweight fabric that's designed to moved gently in the breeze so that you can stay cool when the sun is shining. Match to the urban-inspired grey and you'll have the contemporary space you've always wanted. We love the idea of working in some sandy beiges so that you can find a natural colour match that will allow you to rest and relax.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Dark Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Pair practicality with style with the roma (fr) in dark blue, where a flame-retardant fabric, ideal for commercial buildings, forms a substantial and contemporary blind with an easy pull-cord mechanism. This distinct blend of fibers creates a crease-free blind with a neat and modern look, and in a gorgeous midnight shade. Match the vibrant and bold dark blue with a complementing and current palette of dove greys, white, and charcoal to form a stylish and modern theme.

products.title: Affinity Storm - Roller Blind
products.description: The lightweight, easy-to-use affinity storm is comprised of a dark grey backdrop fabric covered with a high quality, stitched pattern that reduces the light coming in from outdoors without having the full influence of a blackout blind. The way that the pattern is stitched allows the affinity storm to gently shine, giving it a modern and chic quality. Try contrasting with dark blues or purples in the living room to provide a rich, opulent colour scheme, or use the affinity patterning to provide character in a much more colour-neutral hallway or landing.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The blackest of blacks, the palermo (blackout) black is not for shy and retiring rooms. This is a blind that wants to stand out and be noticed, and noticed it certainly will be. With the latest blackout technology, this blind is a must for a night-time feel all day long. Create a moody focal point in a home office or dining room by adding the palermo black to a monochrome colour scheme, and accessorise with bright red or hot fuchsia if you can't resist a little colour.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: The simple yet elegant roma (fr) in snow forms a graceful look with its delicate and pliable cloth, which also holds a quality, flame-retardant benefit. This agile fabric produces a sophisticated feel with its simple rolling mechanism, and in a soothing and versatile white shade. Frame the alluring snow with a contrasting coral or plum shade, to both accent the striking white of the blind and create a distinctive colour scheme for the remaining dcor.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Ebony - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the bold and contemporary roma (fr) in ebony within a modern or commercial surrounding for a touch of brooding colour with distinctive character. This elegant and nimble blind holds beneficial, practical qualities, with its simple rolling mechanism and flame-retardant fabric. Combine the ebony with a distinctive blend of fuschia and teal fabrics, forming a contemporary palette with bright and alluring colours.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out. Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout) Palace - Roller Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) palace really is a blackout blind fit for royalty, with its deep, dark blue and high quality grained finish. Use to keep light disturbances at bay and don't worry about how often it's used - this blind is durable and will last year upon year. This dark, regal blue will look fantastic in a blue and white kitchen, perhaps with a few bright accents, such as yellow or red. Or hang in the playroom or kids' bedroom for maximum impact against bright, fun wallpapers.

products.title: Splash (Blackout) Code - Roller Blind
products.description: Soothing and luxurious, the cool grey splash (blackout) code adds a sense of tranquillity to any room. This shimmering blind is easy to clean making it a practical choice as well as a stylish one, not to mention the easy-rolling mechanism that it hangs from. Create a feeling of sanctuary in your bathroom by pairing with an all-white or pale grey scheme, and accessorising with pops of colour. The code will match most shades, with turquoise and green being popular options.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cerise - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid hot pink of the palermo (blackout) in cerise will catch your eye every time you enter the room. This blind combines fun with functionality, as its cutting edge blackout fabric and fuss-free design make this a usable and lasting window dressing. Go bright in the bathroom by offsetting the cerise against white walls and complementing it with matching towels and bathroom accessories. It would also make a funky addition to a child's bedroom when paired with lighter pinks and whites.

products.title: Crystalline Voile Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Cream focuses on celebrating the interplay between ambient light and finely woven fabric. The subtle variations in thickness and spacing of the mesh give the fabric a life of its own that provides an extra layer of depth for your eye to explore. Use cream where you want to break up a simple monotone surface by adding a little bit of texture that won't come to the fore in the same way that an eye-catching floral pattern would.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout) Code - Roller Blind
products.description: An understated, pale, green-grey shade combined with a natural twig pattern makes the rapture (blackout) code a sophisticated option for the modern home. There's more to this attractive blackout blind than just looks though; the durable fabric and easy-roll mechanism make this a practical choice too. The code is an essential choice for a contemporary kitchen with a garden view. This handsome blind would be most at home amongst subtle earth tones and muted neutrals, and could work beautifully in the hallway or utility room.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Raven - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) raven is a bold and beautiful metallic blind, with a cracked black pattern spread across its funky background. This pretty, durable, and high quality blind is eye-catching and memorable, and will be the star of the show in any room. The raven will look best amongst colours of a similar ilk, such as other metallic silvers, jet blacks, and cool greys. It would make a fashionable addition to a teenager's room or to a glamourous dining room, where 'luxury' is the word of the day.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cotton - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cotton is a subtle shade of white that provides a clean yet discreet look to any window. The sturdy, durable fabric is also flexible and smooth, making for a high quality, easily usable blackout blind. Team the cotton with soft pastels and light woods for a light and airy kitchen, or with heavy greys and blacks for an industrial-look living room. You might even use it in the bedroom, where it would sit pretty amongst florals and checks.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout) Icecap - Roller Blind
products.description: Sarra (blackout)'s icecap is a brilliant, vivid white shade that will set accompanying colours alight. The simple, grainy texture of this blind looks similar to woodgrain, and despite the fabric's pale colour, it is an effective blackout blind. Use in a chic, contemporary kitchen with plenty of other white, and the occasional pop of colour here and there. Alternatively, accent boldly coloured walls in a living room by placing the icecap right in the middle, making it a feature all its own.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in light grey is soft in colour but hardy in quality, and despite its pale hue, has excellent blackout properties, blocking out any kind of light you need it to. Tame bold reds, bright blues, or neon greens or complement slate greys, ebony blacks, and stark whites; the choice is yours. This is the perfect blind for a monochrome bathroom for a contemporary or industrial look.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: Immerse yourself in the pretty pink of the palermo (blackout) blush, a powerful blackout blind that, despite its light colour, will keep out unwanted sunlight, whatever time of day. The blush will add texture and atmosphere to any room, and will suit a light, country kitchen particularly well, so nestle it amongst pretty florals and creams. For a contemporary feel in a bedroom, add to rich purples and glitzy golds; despite the subtlety of this hue, it can add a truly opulent feel when paired correctly.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Midnight - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) midnight really is the colour of night-time, making it a clear choice when it comes to picking a blackout blind, and is uncompromising in its quality - of material, functionality, and colour. Kids who love astrology or space-themed rooms will love the midnight, so add it to their bedroom or playroom with complementary accessories for a really life-like feel. Don't discount the bathroom though; this hue will match plenty of blue and aqua shades and will really stand out against white tiling and silver fittings.

products.title: Deanna Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna latte combines the signature patterning of the deanna with a rich, creamy brown we call latte. The pretty texture adds interest, while the colour is subtle and fairly neutral, and combined they offer a quality finish perfect for your home. Ideal for bringing a touch of much needed warmth to all-white conservatory or utility, this blind will look stunning combined with natural furniture and woods.

products.title: Tiffany Gentle - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever combination of a light cream, gently curved patterning, set on a deeper cream fine fabric background, the tiffany gentle has a pleasing homely feel and will sit subtly amidst almost any colour scheme. The tiffany gentle is a very versatile blind, and is particularly suited to more traditional dcor styles. It can provide a wonderful lightening effect in living rooms or dining rooms where darker woods and furniture might take over, or can provide a touch of modern patterning to a neutral hallway or conservatory without dominating your existing style.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft sunshine of the palermo (blackout) yellow will add a cheery freshness to a window, even when it's doing its job of blocking out the outside light. Add to that the superior quality of the sleek blackout fabric and you have the perfect window covering. Use this blind in a modern country kitchen for both function and style; paired with other pastels and pretty florals, your window covering will give the room a summery, airy feel.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cameo - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft cream of the palermo (blackout) in cameo offers a subtle, barely-there look, despite being a powerful blackout blind that will block out even the brightest of the sun's rays as and when you need it to. Its durable, wipe-clean material makes for a long-lasting and easy-to-use functional window covering. For a light and airy look in the bathroom, pair up the cameo with dusky lilacs or country greens, and accessories with gold trims and fittings.

products.title: Capri (Blackout) Code - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutrals have a bad reputation for being a little dull and uninteresting, but the capri (blackout) code changes everything. The pale silver patterning on the creamy beige background creates a pretty window covering that is far from boring and will only add interest to whichever room it's placed in. Use the code in a bedroom full of rich browns with modern silver accessories, or in a white or cream living room for a light and luxurious feel.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: Indulge your guests in comforting colour with the roma (fr) in latte, featuring a rich and delectable shade of brown. This lenient fabric is both crease-proof and flame-retardant, making it an elegant and modern blind with added practical benefits. Feature the latte amidst an assortment of neutral tones including cream, biscuit, and caramel hues to generate a dcor style with sumptuous and sophisticated colour.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) White - Roller Blind
products.description: White might not be your first instinct when looking for a blackout blind, but don't rule out the palermo (blackout) white just because of its colour. When it comes to keeping out harmful and distracting uv rays, this blind comes top of the class. The wipe-clean fabric of the palermo range makes this the perfect choice for kitchen windows, and will really gleam paired with colourful patterns and light wood worktops.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Bright Orange - Roller Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) range offers the latest in light-blocking window coverings, and the bright orange is no different. But it isn't substance over style here; the bright, eye-catching hue will make a statement wherever its used. The rich, summery glow of the bright orange adds an energised quality and isn't for the shy and retiring. By fixing this blind in the bedroom, you can wake up to this sunshine glow every morning, no matter the weather.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Bumblebee - Roller Blind
products.description: Bumblebee from their ever-popular origin (blackout) range is one of those fabrics that you have to see to believe. It's so much more than another warm yellow because it actually feels like it radiates warmth and cheer around the room. Perfect when you want to bring small rooms and compact spaces to life instantly. The beauty of bumblebee is that you can use it in just about any setting. In the bedroom it mimics the glow of the summer sun first thing in the morning, and in the kitchen it provides that spark of inspiration you need when you want to create something delicious.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Mix practicality with style by featuring the quality origin (blackout) in oyster grey within your home. Being a quality blackout blind, this blind can help you and your family to get the best night's sleep possible by blocking out the night-time light and summertime sun. Complement the delectable oyster grey with a harmonising combination of coffee and cream tones to produce a warm and welcoming room full of soothing colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: Combat those long nights of disturbed sleep by opting for the origin (blackout) in taupe, a quality blackout blind with modern style and opulent colour. This blind will shields against both night-time light and summer-time sun, making it a practical choice as well as a pleasing one. Compliment the taupe with a mild and elegant dcor scheme featuring ivory, biscuit, and caramel hues. Include plenty of compelling textures and sumptuous cloths to create a comforting realm, adding golden embellishments and gilded accessories for a modern, metallic edge to a traditional scheme.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Whisper - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin whisper is a blackout fabric unlike any other. It combines gentle hints of beige and light grey that will add understated chic styling to any contemporary home. This is truly a fabric that is willing to break the mould to add something subtly different you won't find anywhere else. Think back to some of the visuals you've fallen in love with over the years, and ask yourself what they all had in common? No matter the question, whisper is the answer because of the way it enables you to weave in half a dozen other colours without losing direction.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Amour - Roller Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout)'s amour truly is the colour of love. A pale yet memorable pink, this pretty hue and lightweight fabric conceals just how sturdy and durable this blind really is, making it the perfect blind for a window that gets plenty of use. Couple with sweet florals or cute stripes and checks for a lovely, welcoming look in a child's bedroom, home office, or kitchen. The colour will work perfectly with the ultra-fashionable shabby chic look when paired with vintage-style furniture and fifties-style patterns.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Dark Purple - Roller Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in dark purple is just that - a high quality, fabric blind that keeps outside light at bay, in a dark, contemporary purple shade. Its sleek, smooth material makes it easy to roll up and down, and is lightweight yet durable to suit plenty of use. To create a moody yet modern look in a bedroom, pair with white walls and dark woods, or with beige neutrals and rich creams for something a little more luxurious.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Jade - Roller Blind
products.description: Standing back and admiring origin (blackout) in jade is an experience unlike any other. It's a deep and thought-provoking green that makes you feel at ease the moment you set eyes on it. All it needs is the perfect matching secondary colour and it'll form the bedrock for some stunning new decor. Take your time to get the balance right and you won't be disappointed. Matching to jade is about choosing between softer reds or more electric blues.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Graphite - Roller Blind
products.description: The slate shade of the origin (blackout) in graphite is about as contemporary a colour as you can get, and its high quality blackout properties make it practical as well as stylish, as do its durable yet lightweight fabric and easy-to-use rolling mechanism. Use amongst bold reds or cool blues in your home office, or give a rustic living room or dining room a modern twist. This blind will look particularly good when paired with light to medium woods and off-white walls.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Flamingo - Roller Blind
products.description: The flamingo from the origin (blackout) has nothing if not attitude. This funky fuchsia shade is bold and daring, perfect for brightening up your home. Don't forget though, this blind is more than just good-looking; it's also practical, hardwearing, and easy-to-use. This hot pink shade will sit perfectly against dark purples, pale pinks, or stark whites, and is perfect for a funky bedroom, bright home office, or accented hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Hazel - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout) hazel is a fabric that's true to its name and more than happy in any contemporary home. It's that gentle woody brown that really lifts the depth and character of a room to new heights that we love, and we know you're going to fall in love with it too. Take your time when figuring out how to work hazel into your chosen space by thinking about ways you can pair it with deep creams and sandy beiges.
